entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Collection expressions: generic method type inference not working when spreading IEnumerable<T> #69706
    17.8
  • Collection expressions: conversion error reported for spread of `dynamic` type #69704
  • Format Document should ignore Visual Studio options when both EnforceCodeStyleInBuild and IDE0055 are enabled #69702
  • Incorrect error formatting for generic attribute missing errors #69700
    Backlog
  • C# compiler hangs in V17.7.2 but works in V17.6.4 #69697
  • Format Document (^K^D) deletes needed line continuation underscores in VB.NET #69696
  • Only run Source-Generator driver in external process. #69694
  • Collection expressions: Report warning when the compiler generates a heap allocation for a ref struct #69693
    17.8
  • Remove WellKnownMembers.System_ReadOnlySpan_T__op_Implicit_ReadOnlySpan_T_Array if not needed #69692
    17.8

Closed

  • [BUG] C# class extensions are not suggested for auto-complete. #69576
    August
  • Completion for global using static attempts to insert a regular using #68791
    Post GA
  • Web Application with specific config not analysed by MsBuildWorkspace #69654
  • Convert to binary/hex is suggested even when it makes the code more complex #69637
    Backlog
  • RenameAnnotation does not activate rename mode (when added to type parameter of local function) #17560
    Backlog
  • VBCSCompiler: Infinite build time #69672
  • CompletionRequest failed in C# DevKit #68704
    August

PullRequests

Created

  • Add granular opt-in property for interceptors #69712
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add to assembly crossgen to avoid JIT increase #69711
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Work around restore issue #69710
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix vsix dependency #69709
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix the ArgumentOutOfRangeException in inline rename #69708
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #69707
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update the C# syntax generator to use a few more modern C# constructs. #69703
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Produce a warning for redundant patterns #69698
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Bind fully-typed lambda only once for error recovery #69695
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix import completion in LSP workspace #69691
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update collection expression tests for .NET 8 #69705
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #69701
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix issue where dedenting a namespace did not dedent raw string literals #69684
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Lower the priority of 'Convert number' and have nested options when there is a long list. #69683
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move to 8.0 preview 7 ref assemblies in compiler tests #69614
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix CSharpSyntaxContext when dealing with UTF8 string literals #69650
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce overhead due to lsp semantic token refresh requests. #69690
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Adjust OptProf config #69681
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: use inline arrays for collection expressions with span target types #69412
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next

Updated

  • Run design time builds out-of-process #69616
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE
  • Collection expression conversions: check elements are convertible #69627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Code refactor action: Remove redundant else statement #68529
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Pool lexed token arrays in SyntaxParser. #69499
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Identify and fix simple using statements in top level expressions #69688
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Improve interpolated string handler compilation error #69671
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.8
  • Rename Razor compiler assemblies #69655
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid static overhead for switch-over-string optimization #69673
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2251760 #69366
  • Make the [Experimental] warning as error by default #69639
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update TFM in tests to net8.0 #69669
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
